name: titanic survival
desc: simple script for predicting survival on the Titanic using logistic regression. The dataset includes both training (train.csv) and test (test.csv) datasets.

name: EDA AMEO Dataset
desc: It was working on performing Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) over a very interesting dataset (with Salary as the target variable)

name: REGEX-Matching web app
desc: This is a simple Flask web application that allows users to input a test string and a regular expression pattern.AND DEPLOYMENT ON AWS EC2.

name: Note taking web app
desc: This Flask application is designed to allow users to add and view notes using session management.

name: NLP
desc: This project is designed to perform text similarity analysis based on sentiment labeling using natural language processing (NLP) techniques.

name: Training AWS DeepRacer Model
desc: demonstrating a keen interest and understanding of reinforcement learning techniques utilized in training autonomous racing models.
